messages.title: Github repository in maintanence
messages.message:
Hey folks, 

 Sorry for the inconvenience caused, our github repository is temporarily down. We'll be using the GitLab mirror till the issue is resolved. Working on an F-droid release as we speak, and play store too.

 Thank you!, 
Team Fetchify

messages.title: Thanks for your opinion on Gemma!
messages.message:
ğŸ‘‹ Hey Testers,

Thanks for the feedback on gemma. Looks like the app crash during the processing was due to a high token count of 4k (Which caused memory overflow).

     Now I've reduced the token to 2k; the local processing runs smoothly, (had to disabled the tags/links in gemma output due to that). You can expect a release tomorrow, with Gemma included in the stable build (along with several other exciting new features). You can run it in the background and it will finish on its own. Just wanted to give you the update. Thank you so much for trying the app. See ya tomorrow!

With love,
Team Fetchify

messages.title: We Value Your Feedback on Gemma!
messages.message:
ğŸ‘‹ Hey Beta Tester,

Thank you for trying out Gemma, our local AI engine! We hope you've had a chance to explore its features and capabilities.

We'd love to hear your thoughts:
â€¢ How is Gemma performing for you?
â€¢ Any bugs or issues you've encountered?
â€¢ Suggestions for improvements or features you'd like to see in the next release?

Your feedback is crucial in shaping Gemma's future. Please take a moment to share your experience using the Google Form linked below [click on LEARN MORE button].

- With love,
Team Fetchify

messages.title: Say Hello to Gemma!
messages.message:
ğŸ‰ Say hello to Gemma - the long-awaited local AI engine is finally here!

You're one of the first beta testers, and your feedback is incredibly valuable to shape its future. Gemma now allows full on-device processing - your images never go to the cloud.

This is an early alpha release, so expect some bugs: batch processing may not always work, and the app might crash or even affect background apps. You can still try the single-image processing reliably by tapping the AI icon on the screenshot details page.

I've shared a Google Form for your feedback [click on LEARN MORE button] (and again after a week). Please report any issues so we can polish everything before public launch.

Thank you for being a part of this journey ğŸ™Œ

- With love,
Team Fetchify

messages.title: Welcome to v1.8.103!
messages.message:
ğŸ‰ Massive thanks to you for using and supporting Fetchify!

Here's what's you should try in v1.8.103:

ğŸ§¹ Hard Delete â€” Now you can fully remove images from your device directly by deleting from the app. (just make sure to disable the safe delete toggle in settings) 

ğŸ“² Swipe between screenshots in fullscreen mode - Now you can open the image in full screen mode and swipe between them without exiting to details screen

âš™ï¸ Revamped Settings layout for easier access

ğŸ¤– Gemini-2.5-pro is back online!

ğŸ§ª Want early access to on-device AI and other exciting beta features?
Toggle Beta Mode in the 'Advanced' section to receive pre-release updates.

Huge thanks to you for helping us level up ğŸ™Œ. 

 With Love, 
Team Fetchify

messages.title: Thanks for opting for Beta
messages.message:
ğŸ‘‹ Welcome aboard, Beta Tester!

Thanks for joining the beta program and supporting Fetchify.

ğŸ™ We apologize for the delay in on-device AI updates â€” a bug in the release channel caused the holdup. It has been fixed in the latest update, and you can expect a pre-release in the next 2 weeks.

Stay tuned and keep testing ğŸ’ª

With Love,
Team Fetchify

messages.title: âš ï¸ v1.8.90 No Longer Supported
messages.message:
v1.8.90 contains several issues that affect core features and overall functionality. While the app won't crash, this version is **no longer supported**.

To get the best experience and access to important fixes, please **update to the latest version immediately**.

 Click on Learn more to Update

 Thank you - Team Fetchify

messages.title: ğŸš€ What's NEW !
messages.message:
Thanks for all your amazing feedback â€” we've been listening! v1.8.80 brings powerful updates to supercharge your screenshot workflow:

â€¢ ğŸ¨ Custom Themes & AMOLED Mode - Tailor the look to match your vibe.
â€¢ ğŸ“± Large Screen Optimization - Seamless support for tablets and foldables.
â€¢ ğŸ“‚ Custom Path Support - Load screenshots from any folder of your choice.

â­ Like the project? Star the repo!
